gameDetails.description:
Promo given out during The Dice Tower 2017 Indiegogo Campaign.

"I control the towns and villages, and specially the people who plague them!"

Erik used to be a herald to the king using his powerful voice to spread the ruler's word throughout the kingdom. However, his lust for power consumed him, filling his mind with dark thoughts of overthrowing the king and sowing chaos in the streets. Meddling with the dark arts, he soon discovers his velvety voice could do more than attract the people's attention, it could raise the dead from the very ground! Wherever Erik the Summoner roams, death follows.

Box includes one miniature and ID cards.

—description from the back of the box
